articles.title: Malaysian Nadiah Wan, Thomson Hospital CEO, among Forbes Asia’s 20 most powerful businesswomen - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Nov 2 — Wan Nadiah Wan Abdullah Yaakob, CEO of the Thomson Hospital in Kota Damansara, Selangor, is the only Malaysian to be listed in Forbes Asia’s top 29 Power Businesswomen this year. The group CEO and executive director of TMC Life Sciences …
articles.content:
Nadiah Wan is group CEO and executive director of TMC Life Sciences. Picture via Forbes Asia

articles.title: Indonesian researchers breed 'good' mosquitoes to combat dengue - AsiaOne
articles.description: YOGYAKARTA - Researchers in Indonesia have found a way to fight disease-bearing mosquitoes by breeding a species of the insect which carries a kind of bacteria that prevents viruses like dengue from growing inside them. Wolbachia is a common bacteria that occ…
